attributes.action: Increase funding of research in British Universities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: University research is essential for the future prosperity of Great Britain. The large number of overseas students at UK universities represents a large "export", in terms of the tuition fees they pay. Allowing research to perish for lack of funding will ultimately reduce the cache of tuition in British Universities, in relation to overseas competition.
